name: h3
description: Introducing the 2026 Warstic Bonesaber Hybrid USA Limited Edition BBCOR Baseball Bat, a game-changer for players seeking precision and power. With a balanced swing feel and a BBCOR certification, this bat is designed to enhance your performance on the field. The 2-piece hybrid construction combines a composite handle with the innovative Katana2X Alloy Barrel, maximizing the sweet spot and increasing whip through the zone. Its eye-catching red, white, blue, and black colorway stands out, while the Tsuka Pro-Tact Grip and Pommel Precision Knob ensure unmatched comfort and control. The Featherlite Aerophite Cap further enhances your swing speed, making this bat a must-have for serious players.
